# Ark Kings Academy__disambig_1

Ark Kings Academy
Ark Kings Academy is a co-educational all-through school  located in Kings Norton, Birmingham, West Midlands, England. Serving students aged 3 to 16, it operates across two sites: the Primary Academy at Tees Grove and the Secondary Academy at Shannon Road. The school is part of the Ark Schools network, a registered charity under English law and sponsored by the parent charity Ark.
History
The Secondary Academy began as Primrose Hill Senior School in 1967, later renamed Kings Norton High School in 1993 to avoid confusion with a nearby primary school. In September 2012, the school converted to academy status and was renamed Ark Kings Academy. The Primary Academy originated as Primrose Hill Primary School, which converted to academy status in September 2012 under the name Ark Rose Primary Academy. In September 2017, Ark Rose Primary Academy formally merged with Ark Kings Academy, sharing an amalgamated senior leadership and administration team.
Sixth Form
As of the current academic year, Ark Kings Academy does not offer a Sixth Form. Students completing Year 11 who meet the entry requirements are often encouraged to continue their education at '''Ark St Alban's Sixth Form, an Ark School in Highgate, Birmingham, located approximately 16 minutes away, which has consistently achieved strong academic results.
Values & Ethos
Ark Kings Academy''' emphasizes the development of character alongside academic achievement. The school's core values are:
Wisdom, Resilience & Kindness
These values permeate all aspects of school life, guiding interactions among students, staff, and the wider community.
Ofsted Warning
In 2022, the school was given a funding warning after being found inadequate during an Ofsted inspection.
The Ofsted report, published in May 2022, following an inspection in February 2022, said: "Some pupils, particularly those who identify as LGBT, experience repeated name-calling and prejudiced behaviour. This means that pupils do not feel safe in the school."
Recent Ofsted Inspection
In March 2024, Ark Kings Academy was rated Good in all areas—education, behaviour, personal development, leadership and management, and early years provision—by Ofsted. The inspection highlighted the '''school's strong leadership, effective teaching, and positive learning environment.
